  • Constructor Details

    • BoardController

      public BoardController()

  • Method Details

    • market

      public void market​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the market button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn and !doneMandatory), then calls the market() method on the MarketController
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • buy

      public void buy​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the buy button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn and !doneMandatory), then calls the buy() method on the BuyController
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • produce

      public void produce​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the produce button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn and !doneMandatory), then calls the produce() method on the ProduceController
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • activate

      public void activate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the activate button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn), then shows a custom Alert asking the user to pick the leader he wants to activate
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • discard

      public void discard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the discard button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn), then shows a custom Alert asking the user to pick the leader he wants to discard
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • swap

      public void swap​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the swap button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn), then shows a custom Alert asking the user to pick the deposit he wants to swap (one alert for the first and one for the second)
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • show

      public void show​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the show button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (!soloGame), then shows the user a choiceDialog asking the name of the player he wants to see
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method called when a user clicks on the endturn button in board.fxml. It checks if the user can do it (his turn and doneMandatory), then sends the action gui's listener(s)
      Parameters:
      event - event generated by the press of the button

    • updateDeposits

      public void updateDeposits()
      This method is used to update the deposits view of a player. It updates the images representing the state of the deposits of the player

    • updateLeaderDeps

      private void updateLeaderDeps​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> deps)
      This method is used when a user has at least one active Leadercard that gives a special deposit. It updates the resources in the special deposit
      Parameters:
      deps - the Map containing the info on the deposits of the player

    • updateStrongbox

      public void updateStrongbox()
      This method is used to update the strongbox view of a player. It changes the label that represents the quantity of a certain resource in the strongbox

    • updateSlots

      public void updateSlots()
      This method updates the Slots on the personal Board.

    • updateLeader

      public void updateLeader()
      This method updates the Leaders on the personal Board (after activate/discard leader actions).

    • updateTiles

      public void updateTiles()
      This method update the TIles on the personale Board.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      This method updates the Player's position (if SoloGame, also Lorenzo's one).

    • updateCurrentPlayer

      public void updateCurrentPlayer()
      This method sets the label that shows who is the current player.

    • disableShow

      public void disableShow()
      This method is called when the user choose to play a singleplayer game (local/online). It disables the show button because this move is available only in multiplayer game

    • disableButtons

      public void disableButtons()
      This method is called when the user receives confirmation of his ending turn action. It disables all the buttons except show

    • enableButtons

      public void enableButtons()
      This method is called when it is the turn of the user. It enables all the buttons

    • disableMandatory

      public void disableMandatory()
      Utility method called when a user correctly did a mandatory action. This method disables the button for mandatory actions because he cannot do another one in the same turn

    • setGui

      public void setGui​(GUI gui)
      Description copied from class: GUIController
      Method used to set the gui for each type of Controller
      Specified by:
      setGui in class GUIController
      Parameters:
      gui - the gui to be set
      See Also:
      GUIController
